title: What's The Dumbest Argument You've Ever Had With Your Partner?
description:
Arguments in relationships happen, but some of them are super trivial. In Kristin's case, she and her husband got into an argument over a shade. Her husband believed the window shade didn't need to be used because of the cars tinted windows.
However Kristin knows the tint doesn't stop the sun from being in their son's eyes. This lead to an argument that was indirectly settled. Kristin explains...
